Sentencas: Ammonia (NH3), which contains about 18 mass% of hydrogen, is regarded not only as one of the most promising hydrogen storage materials but also as an efficient carbon-free energy carrier which can be directly used by e.g. high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Cation/anion dependence of metal ammine borohydrides/chlorides studied by ab initio calculations

Sentencas: For the development of the NH3-based sustainable society, it is important to improve NH3 storage technologies.
Titulo: Cation/anion dependence of metal ammine borohydrides/chlorides studied by ab initio calculations

Sentencas: In this paper, we have studied the microscopic properties of NH3 absorption in metal borohydrides and metal chlorides by ab initio calculations.
Titulo: Cation/anion dependence of metal ammine borohydrides/chlorides studied by ab initio calculations

Sentencas: We have revealed that there is a systematic cation dependence in the NH3 absorption properties of such materials, and the properties of NH3 absorption are mainly governed by NH3-cation interactions and NH3-anion repulsions.
Titulo: Cation/anion dependence of metal ammine borohydrides/chlorides studied by ab initio calculations
